node.name: Clay Mark II
node.shortdescription: *** Now on sale for outside of Japan!! *** Clay Mark II allows you to visually design, validate database models, and generate the SQL(DDL) code appropriate for your database. With license, additional features below are enabled. *Support for Oracle, DB2 and MS SQL Server *Reverse engineer from JDBC connection *Print, generate HTML reports, export a diagram as a JPEG image
node.body: *** Now on sale for outside of Japan!! *** Clay Mark II allows you to visually design, validate database models, and generate the SQL(DDL) code appropriate for your database. With license, additional features below are enabled. *Support for Oracle, DB2 and MS SQL Server *Reverse engineer from JDBC connection *Print, generate HTML reports, export a diagram as a JPEG image
